section.title: The System Event Portlet
section.para: This portlet shows changes which happened in the system for the logged on user. The first two functions which are working now:

listitem.para: Tasks which are assigned either in projectmanager or workeffort.
These event can be notified to the user even when not logged on to OFBiz by using a firefox plugin and when it changes the employee is notified from within firefox

The plugin: http://updatescanner.mozdev.org/en/index.html and it should check the following url: (adjust to your requirements) https://localhost:8443/myportal/control/showPortletSimpleDecorator?portalPortletId=SystemInfoNotes&USERNAME=admin&PASSWORD=ofbiz
In the Flat Grey theme (only) notifications show in the header when they are available.
